title: Verify the when there is a resume date on a event ticketing client should returns one event with the latest resumeDate
custom_preconds:
Given
An event is having a resumeDate
custom_steps:
When
I have submit a below api request
Ticketing client |GameTicket.tiksrv|
Ex https://qa.ticketing-client.com/ticketing-client/ticketing-client/ticketing-client/json/GameTicket.tiksrv?leave_empty_games=true&team_id=135&team_id=144&schedule_id=605911&sapi=ls&ignoreCache=t1cket$
statsapi call |schedule?gamePk=605911&useLatestGames=true|
custom_expected:
Then
Below date should match

Ticketing client game_date
Statsapi officialDate

title: Verify when there is a reschedule date on an event ticketing client should returns the latest reschedule
custom_preconds:
Given
An event is having a reschedule date
custom_steps:
When
I have submit the below api request
ticketing client |gameTicket|
https://qa.ticketing-client.com/ticketing-client/ticketing-client/ticketing-client/json/GameTicket.tiksrv?leave_empty_games=true&team_id=135&team_id=144&schedule_id=605911&sapi=ls&ignoreCache=t1cket$

statsapi |schedule?gamePk=605911&useLatestGames=true|
https://qa-statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/schedule?gamePk=605911&useLatestGames=true

title: Verify the inActive teams events still returns for year when team was active without passing a year param
custom_preconds:
Given
Team present in 2019
And
Team is not  present in 2021
custom_steps:
When
I submit the below request
http://qa.ticketing-client.com/ticketing-client/json/EventPromotionThin.tiksrv?leave_empty_games=true&sub_category=Default&ticket_category=TICKETS&team_id=558&site_section=Default&display_in=SCHEDULE&begin_date=20190101&end_date=20191231
custom_expected:
Then
It should display the events for 2019
And
There should not be any errors

title: Verify the inActive events not being returned for the year it is inActive
custom_preconds:
Given
Team present in 2019
And
Team is not present in 2021
custom_steps:
When
I submit the below request
http://qa.ticketing-client.com/ticketing-client/json/EventPromotionThin.tiksrv?leave_empty_games=true&sub_category=Default&ticket_category=TICKETS&team_id=558&site_section=Default&display_in=SCHEDULE&begin_date=20210101&end_date=20211231
custom_expected:
Then
It should not returns any Events

title: Verify the Game event shows TDB when event timeDate is not 3:33
Verify the game event shows TDB when event time is 3:33 GMT
Verify the fame event shows TDB when event time is 3.33 local timezone
Verify the NGE shows TBD when nge event has 3:33 GMT time
Verify the NGE shows TDB when NGE has eventTime as 3:33 local Time
Verify double header game shows TBD when the game time is 5 mins after first game with a TBD flag set to true in stats
Verify the first game of the double header shows the actual time when second game is set to TBD
Verify the game event show the actual time when there is no TBD flag set
Verify the NGE event shows the actual time when there is not TBD flag set
